website_summaries.verdict: An excellent chair with superior customer ratings for comfort and durability. The best deal on the market.
pros: Great details, including padded, anti-bacterial seat and ergonomic contouring
cons: Quick-release wheels can be tricky to operate

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair for my son, but within a month the armrests had started to break. He uses the armrests to get all the way to the back, and this chair's armrests couldn't take that. He is not at all heavy, so that tells me they are not of a very good quality. He has always done this with his previous chairs, and they either never broke, or they lasted a good long time. The whole chair seems a bit flimsy. On the positive side, it is comfortable to him.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: chair is default set at 19, in order to lower seat front casters have to be purchased. too big for little lady.
customer_reviews.text: so far it looks nice. seems to move easy didnt get the red color that i ordered but thats ok seat is nice, called company on how to lower seat and was told that one has to purchase some smaller front casters in order to do this for $49 per caster each. I felt that the additional cost was not worth and chair is fairly heavy so i returned it and purchased the 115 ergo light at 19 lbs, 16 inch, my mom is 5 ft 2 and weighs 138 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Monkeypony

customer_reviews.title: No more dead legs / bottom from sitting in the wheelchair!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this a lot yet, but so far I'm in love. The seat design is SO much better than the usual wheelchair. My husband loves the handles for when he pushes me. They're a better height and grip than my old cheapo chair. I ordered the open box item. While the box was damaged, as anticipated, the item was in perfect condition with all expected parts. Will update if my opinion changes after use, but so far I'm delighted, even at the higher cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in September for indoor use only, and not 24/7. It has quickly and surely been falling apart. Initially I contacted the manufacturer when trouble occurred within the early weeks and encountered terrible customer service. I challenged them and they sent some replacement part. None of which has been worth my time or money. This gadget is clearly a scam put together to last a few months and by their frustrating you with their appalling customer service, you will give up as they laugh all the way to the bank. It is now several months later and various parts have fallen apart, especially the arm rests making usage very uncomfortable. Avoid this product! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: BALFOUR

customer_reviews.title: This chair will cut up your legs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wheelchair for a loved one and found that while ergonomic and lightweight, the design is flawed. The edges are sharp across the board and design was filmed on lumbar support, but not a comprehensive design to promote individuals safety and health. The legs of the wheelchair and the Velcro to support the legs are sharp and caused multiple cuts and abrasions on the calf and underneath and on the side of the thighs. Both my loved one and myself tested the chair and both experienced the same issue. I recommend you Do NOT purchase this chair, it does not live up the reviews and is certainly not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sahrr Malik

customer_reviews.title: Get a chair that actually works
customer_reviews.text: December 2018 we received a karman s 305 with damage breaks. We returned this chair and promptly received a new chair After less than 3 month the new chair is not working. The breaks simply do not function. My husband uses the chair as his only way to move around. I no longer have a box for return Kindly advice what to do. Britt
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Sovich

customer_reviews.title: Kaman Wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: Very well balanced. My husband says it's very easy & smooth getting me up front & back steps. Comfortable, light-weight but not at all 'flimsy'. Could do without the foot straps tho. They are fairly useless. Takes a bit longer to fold up to put in car (compared to other cheesy wheelchairs I've seen) but overall comfort, stability & style- high marks. As wheelchairs go, it's actually rather 'attractive'.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Deakyne

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: The chairs manuverability around the house is excellent. It's a very smooth ride, quite, very lightweight, gets in and out of tight spaces and provides day long comfort sitting for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: So far, used 5 days, great. Appreciated the swift delivery. Liked the fold down back, the easy removal of the foot rest , the weight and ease of loading, the arm rest adjustment, etc. And I (77 yrs. old) haven't had the courage yet to pop off the wheels. Dale is my husband of 52 yrs. and in a nursing home. So far, so good. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dale J. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this chair. I’ve had a regular wheelchair for 5 years and cannot believe the difference this will make for me. Easy to maneuver. Legs come off easily. Having arms that flip back will help when I go to a restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal A. Sada

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This wheelchair is not only a lot more comfortable for the person in it...it is a lot more comfortable for the person pushing it because of the higher push bars! We are both very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth wheelchair and easily the best of all. Very well designed and constructed.. The leg supports are the easiest to use of any I have used. Having tread on the tires is great as I do go outside. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Grandpa
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take wheels off for putting on car. Easy to put back on. First ride was a “luxury” according to my dad, we are happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: NDG

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, durable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey as compared to other wheelchairs but this unit definitely makes up for it by being lightweight, comfortable, durable and convenient. Very easy to breakdown and stow in the trunk or backseat of a car. Purchased it for my late mother. Now used by my 90+ year old aunt. Excellent choice for caregivers to use for their spouse, partner, parent(s) or relatives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My wife has vertigo and has a hard time waking any distance. I purchased this wheelchair because of the ratings. I have found that my wife finds it extremely comfortable. It is easy to use and light. Folding is quite simple and the footrests easily detach and reattach. I highly recommend this product even though we have not used it a lot yet.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice but don’t expect long term!
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair but only lasted 13 months. Exactly when the warranty ran out. Used daily.
customer_reviews.author: Charcel

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: It is very light and maneuverable and I'm able to propel myself using my feet. It fits through a very narrow bathroom door. I feel so much safer and don't have to rely on my poor husband for EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.author: Bess

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Features
customer_reviews.text: So far has met all of the expectations that were set! Very easy to asemble and light weight but sturdy enough to handle regular use (again so far this is day 1)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but not as good I was think it
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to order this wheelchair ,It has everything I wanted, but not as good I was think it , I did not like it at all and I don't have it any more I hope the new owner will happy-er ...
customer_reviews.author: atlantis

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazingly well made, light-weight, balanced, manageable wheel chair I have ever laid my hands on!!! Kudos to the designer and manufacturer for exceeding my expectations on every small detail. Quick release foot rests unlike any I've ever seen, extra light frame but strong. Tires that actually hold the brake contact, and brakes that you don't have to "fish" for! The seat covers are extraordinary in both comfort and functionality. EVERYTHING adjusts to a custom fit. I can't say enough good. The shipping was right on the money, and NO assembly required. Heartfelt thanks to the Karman company for making such and incredible piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Speaker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & easy to get in and of car
customer_reviews.text: My wife has MS and we were using the old shiny silver hospital type chair. This is so much more comfortable for her and easier for me to lug around.
customer_reviews.author: meow

customer_reviews.title: This wheelchair works amazing, it is light weight and fits in my ...
customer_reviews.text: This wheelchair works amazing, it is light weight and fits in my car trunk. We take it everywhere when I go with my mom. This model comes in slim which is good for my mom since she it fairly small.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K. Sandwith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to sit in for extended periods
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. Comfortable to sit in for extended periods, easy to operate, light enough that a woman can lift into vehicle. Very well engineered, too. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Corey

customer_reviews.title: The shipping quality was unusually bad.
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to review this product but it arrived mangled when I got it out of the box IMG_7424.jpeg
customer_reviews.author: Martin S.

customer_reviews.title: To big for mom.
customer_reviews.text: Great wheel chair, but to high for my short little mom. Mom is 93 now and in the wheelchair all the time. Her spine is bent with old age and her short little legs would not reach the floor. She is less then 5 feet tall. We never used the wheelchair because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: The wheelchair is great, however customer support is not
customer_reviews.text: The wheelchair is great, however customer support is not. I had a problem with tipping forward and called Karman. The Karman rep. was wheelchair ignorant and unpleasant to talk to.
customer_reviews.author: Dale F.

customer_reviews.title: does not change heights and no ergonomic handrims
customer_reviews.text: Chair is uncomfortable. The ergonomic seat was not comfortable at all. The handrims were not ergonomic as described on the page. I tried increasing the floor to seat height. I raised the back wheels but did not see any levels on the front wheels. so the chair titled forwards. Manufacture responded to my question saying the front wheels are raise-able but did not respond to my followup question of how. Visually the front wheels cannot be raised. I would not advise shoppers to buy. When i returned it I was charge 36 dollars for shipping. Bad experience overall.
customer_reviews.author: rasha k.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chair. Very easy to load and unload into SUV.
customer_reviews.author: bobdcol

customer_reviews.title: Nice wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: We chose this wheelchair because it was lightweight. However, to make it really lightweight, not only the footrests, but also the wheels must be removed which is somewhat difficult when it is on the ground outside the car.. Also I wish I would have chosen the 16" rather than the 18", although obviously that is my own doing - nothing to do with the wheelchair itself. I think we will be quite satisfied with the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great chair easy to get in and out of car comfortable very adjustable
customer_reviews.author: Paul Labby

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The foot strips are not necessary. It is rather troublesome.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Chang

customer_reviews.title: One of the best I have used or experienced.
customer_reviews.text: The styling is very functional. The quality of the materials and the maneuverability is far superior to most other wheelchairs. The weight is heavier than I expected. Maneuvering the wheelchair in and and out of my standard sized sedan is a challenge. All in all, the chair is a superior product that was worth the price. Jo Ann Gray-Murray
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Gray-Murray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great chair, good support for someone who sets in chair all day
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Light, comfortable seat, hard to steer
customer_reviews.text: Could have been good, but the wheels weren't parallel, so it didn't track straight. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: sunsurfandsand

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair
customer_reviews.text: A bit overpriced. Loved all the whistles and bells. However, my 101 yr-old mother did not like the fit. She said the seat was too shallow and not roomy enough. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Kubagirl

customer_reviews.title: Could I have saved some $$'s ?
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, as advertised, but confusing as to differences of other chairs less costly....assumed better just because it cost more????biggest complaint is the difficulty in comparing the chairs on the internet
customer_reviews.author: D. Hollis Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wheelchair.
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, comfortable chair. If it came with a seatbelt, I would give it five stars
customer_reviews.author: Willt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: model s-305 ergonomic ultra wheel chair (turns easy in small places.
customer_reviews.author: Rowdy

customer_reviews.title: REVISED I do like it....BUT
customer_reviews.text: I'm not wheelchair reviewer in that I have not tried a lot of different ones other than in rehab. I do like it but in less than two 2 years it have developed problems. The armchair rest is totally falling apart. I have not had them on 100% of the time as they don't fit under my desk. The bolts and spacers on the fenders fell off. Some of the spokes of the wheels have loosened and I need to get it to a bike place to adjust. It seems it does not roll as easy. Hard to know. I was in bad shape after the amputation. Unsure as to a repurchase as to a less than 2 years
customer_reviews.author: steg

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like this chair much but now I’m stuck with it for awhile
customer_reviews.text: Left break needed replacement after less then a year of normal use. It cost $80. not including labor and not under warranty. This chair is often stiff and difficult to push. Foot pedals are very hard to remove. This is inconvenient when traveling and putting it in the trunk. This chair doesnt come with a seat cushion. It’s fairly lightweight to lift into trunk and it folds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and comfortable premium wheel chair
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy yet lightweight wheelchair. Very comfortable seating design without a pad, although a pad may be desirable for some users. Flexible adjustment areas, including seat height, armrest height and foot rest height. Large rear wheels have quick release mechanism to allow seat height adjustment. Arms can be swiveled back behind the unit so that wheelchair can be rolled right up to a dining table without interference from the armrests, allowing the user to sit closer to the table. Far less costly than a customized chair, but this is perhaps the premium non-customized chair on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Karman Health Care S 305ergonomic Ultra Light Manual Wheel Chair
customer_reviews.text: I got this chair for my mother. She really likes the chair. It is easy to push and very comfortable. She is not very strong, but is able to move this chair a little, because it is so light. Easy, Easy, Easy to fold and lift. It fits easily in a car. Of course there are wheel chairs that are a lot cheaper, but they are usually heavier, harder to push, fold,navigate and lift. This chair is covered with breathable fabric to avoid sweating that can occur with the ones with the plastic or vinyl material. Also, the cushion can be machine washed. For the comfort level and the light weight, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie

customer_reviews.title: My wife loved the chair
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved the chair.. it was everything it said it would be. However we had to return it because it was just a little bit too bulky for her to handle when loading it and unloading it by herself. It also sat a little bit too high and made it hard to transfer in and out of it. She says otherwise though she loved it. it was very solidly built and felt very safe to be in. Somethings have to be EXACTLY right though and this just wasn't the one for HER. She said to give it 5 stars because overall it was a really good chair for the money.
customer_reviews.author: michael cornwell

customer_reviews.title: Almost a good wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: A quality chair - but the owners manual is lacking on how to adjust the chair, there were no tools provided to make adjustments to the chair. No information on where, or how to contact, authorized factory business for adjustments. I would not buy this chair "blind" again. In fact I would like to return the wheelchair and get my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for this wheel chair. I find it a bit difficult to make turns and also it's a bit noisy (creacky), especially at night when I;m trying to quietly wheel in to the bedroom! For the price paid I was expecting better.
customer_reviews.author: beesting

customer_reviews.title: comfort & light !
customer_reviews.text: sturdy light design.air-less tires all good, insurance wasn't an option. folding back w/ curve seating very comfortable. added my own (optional) Pneumatic tires for better ride and easy on the hands. open box thru amazon was a real bonus.
customer_reviews.author: twinthom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wheel Chair: Light but Rugged
customer_reviews.text: Bought an open box version of this to save almost 50%. The product arrived in perfect condition. What a great size . Really well made! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: US Expat business  guy

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Great design and the erognomic seat makes a huge difference!
customer_reviews.author: Genedba

customer_reviews.title: good wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my father and he likes it, very comfortable and much more manueverable through smaller spaces. Dont bother with the cheap brands, you will not be happy. They are to heavy. This is half the weight of the builky ones
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: This Chair is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This Chair is awesome! Every one of the Health care workers can not believe the features and quality of this chair. Dad loves it. Well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: AJ Collectibles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wheel myself, comfortable to sit in, beautiful to look at. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome and comfortable. My mom who is 101 loves it.Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice wheel chair!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it five stars because my mom loves it. It is so light that she can even move it.The chair is very comfortable and made of breathable fabric! It is very easy to fold and fits easily in the trunk of a car. A strong person could probably do it with one hand. I did have to return it for a larger size because the nurse gave me the wrong size. Measure carefully. UPDATE: ******This wheelchair is not for people who can not bend their legs well! The rests only go up and down!
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wheelchair, just wish the part that you grip wasn't so slick and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: justfortoday74

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chair
customer_reviews.text: I really like my wheelchair, it is very comfortable to sit in and easy to manuever, but is quite hard to get over thresholds or bumps. Folds and unfolds easily.
customer_reviews.author: MARIE

customer_reviews.title: light weight but a bit expensive, pulls to right ...
customer_reviews.text: light weight but a bit expensive, pulls to right, tried all adjustments with no luck, my inexpensive chair is much better
customer_reviews.author: carmen

product_meta.title: Karman 29 pounds S-305 Ergonomic Wheelchair 18" Pearl Silver
product_meta.description: The Karman Healthcare S-ERGO305 series is the idea chair for users requiring comfort, adjustability, and ruggedness. Standard features include a 1" OD aircraft grade aluminum frame with a limited lifetime warranty, our patented s-shape seating frame, removable anti bacterial seat and back cushions, removable and adjustable footrest, flip back armrest coupled with adjustable height armpads, and an adjustable seat height capable of 18", 19", and 20" seat to floor height, quick release rear wheels are also standard and allow for an additional 3 pounds of weight savings. With the abundance of adjustability, comfort, and high end craftsmanship, the S-305 is suitable for both indoor and outdoor usage for users up to 250 pounds.
feature_bullets: Removable Anti Bacterial Seat and Back Cushions
Flip Back Armrest and Height Adjustable. Storage pouch on backrest
Seat Height Adjustable 18", 19", & 20".7 inch x 1 inch Polyurethane Front Casters

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
